stem: A patient with vasculitis reports numbness in the first web space between the hallux and second toe. Which nerve is affected?
rationale_correct: The deep fibular nerve supplies sensation to the first dorsal web space.

rationale_distractors.B: Superficial fibular nerve supplies most of the dorsum of the foot except the first web space.
rationale_distractors.C: Saphenous nerve supplies medial leg/foot, not the first web space.
rationale_distractors.E: Tibial nerve supplies the sole (via medial/lateral plantar nerves).

evidence.citation: Anderson A. CIL â€“ Multisystem autoimmune diseases. Dec 11, 2024.
